amendment.description: To require the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to provide veterans read-only access to the documents of such veterans contained in the Individual Longitudinal Exposure Record.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1971 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1971 proposed by Senator Reed for Senator Tester to Amendment SA 2301. (consideration: CR S4184; text: CR S4192) To require the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to provide veterans read-only access to the documents of such veterans contained in the Individual Longitudinal Exposure Record.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1971 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1971 proposed by Senator Reed for Senator Tester to Amendment SA 2301.
